Adjective: relating to or common to or descriptive of all members of a genus
applicable to an entire class or group
Noun: wine that does not meet the minimum qualifications and standards for use of a designation by appellation of origin (where the grapes are grow)
such as `vin rouge', `vino rosso', `rotwein', `red wine', etc.
as `vin ordinaire', `vin de table', `vino da tavola', `tafelwein', `table wine', etc.
any product that can be sold without a brand name
